remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AutoResized> event is raised when the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] layout system causes a <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> to resize automatically. A typical handler implementation would communicate size changes to the HWND contained within the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>.
